# BooleanExtensions.ToBinaryNotation method

Convert the value specified in its binary equivalent value.

Returns 1 for true; otherwise 0

```csharp
public static byte ToBinaryNotation(this bool value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The value to convert. |

## Return Value

Returns a Byte value that represents specified value.
